mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.f_type AS "type", a.f_approval_emplid AS "approvalEmplId.id", a.f_index AS "index", a.f_name AS "name", a.f_status AS "status", a.f_date AS "date", a.f_remark AS "remark", a.f_istoapp AS "isToapp", a.f_islast AS "isLast", a.f_sobillid AS "sobillId.id", date_format(a.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%m:%s') AS "createDateStr", approvalEmplId.name AS "approvalEmpName"
LEFT JOIN sys_user approvalEmplId ON approvalEmplId.id = a.f_approval_emplid INNER JOIN ic_sobill sobillId ON sobillId.id = a.f_sobillid LEFT JOIN tb_customer cus ON cus.id = sobillId.f_custid
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ic_order_approve( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, f_type, f_approval_emplid, f_index, f_name, f_status, f_date, f_remark, f_istoapp, f_islast, f_sobillid ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{type}, #{approvalEmplId.id}, #{index}, #{name}, #{status}, #{date}, #{remark}, #{isToapp}, #{isLast}, #{sobillId.id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ic_order_approve SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, f_type = #{type}, f_approval_emplid = #{approvalEmplId.id}, f_index = #{index}, f_name = #{name}, f_status = #{status}, f_date = #{date}, f_remark = #{remark}, f_istoapp = #{isToapp}, f_islast = #{isLast}, f_sobillid = #{sobillId.id} WHERE id = #{id}
